title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work! Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to relief with this versatile foot stool. Made with high quality foam and a durable fabric cover, this footrest comes in a sleek black color and features 2 adjustable heights, making it perfect for use in the office, car, home, or even on the airplane.

The magic tapes and zipper mechanism allow for easy height adjustment, while the removable and machine washable cover makes for effortless cleaning. The non-slip design ensures stability, and the ergonomic design supports correct sitting habits. Whether you're looking to relieve back, lumbar, or knee pain, or just want to improve your overall comfort, the BlissTrends Foot Rest has got you covered. Don't let discomfort hold you back - upgrade your workspace with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work today!
